channel.title: CVE Feed for Cimatti Consulting -- Contact Forms by Cimatti
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Cimatti Consulting -- Contact Forms by Cimatti

item.title: CVE-2024-29117|2024-08-02T01:03:51.765Z -- cimatti%20consulting -- contact%20forms%20by%20cimatti
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Cimatti Consulting Contact Forms by Cimatti allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Contact Forms by Cimatti: from n/a through 1.7.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-30549|2024-06-04T17:38:41.193Z -- cimatti%20consulting -- contact%20forms%20by%20cimatti
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Cimatti Consulting Contact Forms by Cimatti allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Contact Forms by Cimatti: from n/a through 1.8.0.

item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Cimatti Consulting Contact Forms by Cimatti allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Contact Forms by Cimatti: from n/a through 1.7.0.
